com.microsoft.azure.management.website.models

Class NetworkFeatures

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.Resource
      • com.microsoft.azure.management.website.models.NetworkFeatures

  • public class NetworkFeatures
extends com.microsoft.azure.Resource
    This is an object used to store a full view of network features (presently VNET integration and Hybrid Connections) for a web app.
